definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: In one word, I love bel canto and Rock & Roll a little more than other forms of performance.
sentences.chinese: 一句話，我喜歡美聲和搖滾多過其他形式的音樂。

sentences.english: Above-head resonating is called quintessence and key in bel conto singing.
sentences.chinese: 面罩共鳴被稱爲美聲唱法的精髓和關鍵。

sentences.english: This is also the essence of "the Principle of High Efficiency and Low Consumption" in bel canto.
sentences.chinese: 這也是“美聲唱法”中“高效低耗原則”的本質所在。

sentences.english: In conclusion, I indicate the development of Bel canto in musical.
sentences.chinese: 結論指出了美聲唱法在音樂劇中的發展問題。

sentences.english: It is the blueprint of the teaching of vocal music in China.
sentences.chinese: 美聲唱法成了中國聲樂教學的藍本。

sentences.english: Chinese singing style is a bit similar to bel canto.
sentences.chinese: 中國的傳統演唱方法和美聲有點相似。

sentences.english: Yet I think I need I Believe in You (Je Crois en Toi) by Il Divo &Toni Braxton more.
sentences.chinese: 可我想，我更需要美聲男伶的我相信你。

sentences.english: He learned to bel canto in a conservatory.
sentences.chinese: 他在音樂學院學習的是美聲唱法。

sentences.english: A scientific way of breathing is the very basis of euphonic singing.
sentences.chinese: 科學的呼吸方法是美聲歌唱的基礎和出發點。

definition: The Sound of Music, Broadway musical (1959) and Academy Award-winning movie (1965)
type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
opera highlights performed as independent pieces
